function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Crowdfunding campaigns may lead to increased public gatherings and physical interactions, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and spread of contagious diseases within the public due to gatherings and interactions during crowdfunding campaigns.","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures, enhance sanitation practices, and promote virtual participation in crowdfunding initiatives.","Technologies":"Online platforms and virtual meeting tools for remote participation in the campaigns.","People":"General public, crowdfunding participants, and organizers of the campaigns.","Owner":"Public health authorities, campaign organizers, and event planners."}]}
